sqlMap.select: SELECT addr.id, addr.id_person, addr.type, dom.address, dom.city, dom.zip, dom.country, dom.pais, dom.preference, NULL as tipoTelematica FROM scr_address addr RIGHT JOIN scr_dom dom ON addr.id=dom.id
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO scr_dom (id, address, city, zip, country, pais, preference) VALUES (#id:INTEGER#, #direccion#, #ciudad.nombre#, #codigoPostal#, #provincia.nombre#, #pais.nombre#, #principal:INTEGER#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM scr_dom WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM scr_address WHERE id_person=#value:INTEGER#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE scr_dom SET address=#direccion#, city=#ciudad.nombre#, zip=#codigoPostal#, country=#provincia.nombre#, pais=#pais.nombre#, preference=#principal:INTEGER# WHERE id=#id:INTEGER#
UPDATE scr_dom SET preference=0 WHERE preference=1 AND id IN (SELECT id FROM scr_address WHERE id_person=#id:INTEGER#)
UPDATE scr_dom SET preference=1 WHERE id=#id:INTEGER# AND id IN (SELECT id FROM scr_address WHERE id_person=#tercero.id:INTEGER#)
